Html:
Hello!

Sometimes I got an error:

Fatal error: Uncaught exception 'Exception' with message 'The filename /usr/home/www/www.example.com/upload/osttmz3009111011.xls is not recognised as an OLE file' in /usr/home/www/www.example.com/upload-files/parsers/lib/PHPExcel/Shared/OLERead.php:87 Stack trace: #0 /usr/home/www/www.example.com/upload-files/parsers/lib/PHPExcel/Reader/Excel5.php(1069): PHPExcel_Shared_OLERead->read('/usr/home/www/w...') #1 /usr/home/www/www.example.com/upload-files/parsers/lib/PHPExcel/Reader/Excel5.php(584): PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5->_loadOLE('/usr/home/www/w...') #2 /usr/home/www/www.example.com/upload-files/parsers/xlsParser.php(9): PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5->load('/usr/home/www/w...') #3 /usr/home/www/www.example.com/upload-files/handlers/osttmz-handler.php(11): parseXls('/usr/home/www/w...', 'CP1251', 'UTF-8') #4 /usr/home/www/www.example.com/upload-files/handlers/osttmz-handler.php(2): osttmzHandler('/usr/home/www/w...', 1.37, '4-6 ????????') #5 /usr/home/www/www.example.com/upload-files/ in /usr/home/www/www.example.com/upload-files/parsers/lib/PHPExcel/Shared/OLERead.php on line 87

After 3-4 page refresh this error dissappear for next 2-3 page refresh. I am thinking that this is a hosting trouble, but dont know which exactly.

Thanks!
